feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Not sponsored
entry.content:
random (or arbitrary?) collection of URLs

  • sigbovik.org : healthy entertainment without compromising attention span - rare these days.

  • thebullshitmachines.com : an honest intro to LLMs for everyone - interactive & fun.

  • johnlangdon.net : fantastic ambigrams and where to find them - inspiring.

  • when-chatgpt-broke-an-entire-field : this is real - if you know you know.

  • dontasktoask.com : a public service announcement - may be for you.

  • ai-2027.com : science fiction [or is it?] - letâ€™s see how far it goes.

  • www.cs.utexas.edu/~EWD : blog of Djikstra - a hidden gem.

  • mynoise.net : original natural sounds for free - no ads.
